website_summaries.verdict: Slightly cheaper than professional models, but with many of the same features. Tough, powerful and a great warranty, too.
pros: A top-of-the line, professional grade cleaner on a budget
tough, powerful and even has a great warranty
cons: A bit too powerful and there's a learning curve involved

customer_reviews.title: Not for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first year, then the handle would stick trying to raise and lower it. Two years in, one of the wheels locked up, and the handle takes a lot of work to get up and down. Everything on the machine that isn’t plastic gets covered in rust. 3 years in and this machine goes to the dumpster. Too much to deal with to use daily. I had an advance floor machine before this one that lasted 17 years, should have paid the extra for another one. Calling this an industrial machine is a joke. First and last time with a koblenz product.
customer_reviews.author: jel

product_meta.title: Koblenz RM-1715 Industrial Floor Machine
product_meta.description: Koblenz has developed high quality floor care products for over 40 years that are targeted at solving real consumer needs in the both the domestic and industrial markets. Quality is designed into the product from its conception. An uncompromising commitment to quality and customer satisfaction is our goal. The Koblenz Heavy Duty Industrial Floor Machine is a durable floor cleaner that is effortless to operate with its 1.5 HP vibration free motor. The non marking sealed double ball bearing wheels protect your floor while they are cleaned, while the wrap around bumper guard gives added protection to walls and furniture. 17-inch burnishing pad for a wide cleaning path and the convenient 50-feet power cord is 14 gauge 3 wire grounded. The chrome steel handle prevents operator fatigue and protects against operator error. Cleaner has a 3 year warranty on motor, transmission and all parts, including labor. Shroud, Chassis - Polyethylene
